channel.title: Click limit?
channel.description: does som1 got code 4 a click limit? i need it so ppl dont mass on my server it gets too laggy. anyone got something like that? so u can only click like once every 6 secs or so?

item.title: Click limit?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Couldn’t you just create a field that gets when the player clicks, and compare to a field that you have as the max wait time?
E.g

public int maxClickTime = 25; // 25 miliseconds.
public int playerClickTime = null; // Initiate it as null type, ready to be assignent an integer.

…
Later on in the code, maybe write a code that gets how fast the player is clicking, maybe in the process method.

And then, perhaps:
if(maxClickTime == playerClickTime) {
playerHandler.kickPlayer(player); // Or however the method is called.
}

I have no idea if you can even compare with the “==” operator between to ints, but you get what I mean… Hopefully.

Read full topic
